sqlMap.select: SELECT MSG_TITLE AS msgTitle, MSG_TYPE AS msgType, MSG_DATE AS msgDate, EMP_NAME AS empName FROM TPOPMGRS,TMSGMGRS,TEMPINFO WHERE MSG_DATE>='2008-01-01' AND MSG_ID = POP_MSGID AND EMP_ID = MSG_EMPID AND POP_STATE IS NULL AND POP_EMPID = #userId# AND (MSG_TYPE=6 OR MSG_TYPE=7 OR MSG_TYPE=8) ORDER BY MSG_DATE DESC
